meanings.definition: The quality of being snotty or having an attitude of superiority or arrogance.
meanings.sent1: Her snottiness was evident in the way she looked down on others.
meanings.sent2: I don't appreciate his snottiness when he talks to me.
meanings.sent3: Despite her snottiness, she couldn't hide her insecurity.
meanings.sent4: His snottiness was like a dark cloud overshadowing the room.
meanings.sent5: The snottiness in her tone made everyone uncomfortable.

meanings.definition: The act of behaving in a rude or disrespectful manner.
meanings.sent1: His snottiness towards the waiter was uncalled for.
meanings.sent2: She showed her snottiness by ignoring everyone at the party.
meanings.sent3: His snottiness backfired when no one wanted to work with him.
meanings.sent4: The snottiness in her actions spoke louder than words.
meanings.sent5: The teacher addressed the student's snottiness in front of the class.
